post-install-cmd: php -r "$d='config'; if(!is_dir($d)) mkdir($d, 0777, true); $u='https://curl.se/ca/cacert.pem'; $t=$d.'/cacert.pem'; $c=@file_get_contents($u); if($c===false){fwrite(STDERR, 'Warning: failed to download CA bundle from '.$u.'\n');} else {file_put_contents($t, $c); echo 'Downloaded CA bundle to '.$t.'\n';}"
